d.f: ￹￺the state of affairs * like this￻事務狀態；像這樣

e: ￹`Matini~ `ko~ `nga'ay~`ay~ `a~ `demak~.￺This is the standard way to do it.￻這是做這件事情的準則
￹`Matini~ `koya~ `demak~.￺This is the way the thing happened.￻事情是這樣發生的
￹`matini~ `ko~ `sowal~ `nira~￺He said it like this (describe how he talked) .￻他是這樣說的
￹`Ma~`samatini~ `ano~ `roma~ `a~ `mi~`heca~`an~ `'i~￺At this time next year...￻明年這個時候
